name: Project Deep Space
description:
Alpha stage of my 2D retro space shooter

There is no autopatching system right now, so please visit this page from time to time or follow on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/ProjectDeepSpace/ for news about updates.

Game is divided into story and survival mode. Survival is opened after story is completed (currently one level}.

Ingame tutorial is now a thing. It's not even close to completation, but it's implemented.

Pilot upgrades planed in near future.

Game finally remember your upgrades and how much credits you have even after it's closed.

It´s hard by design

Controls: keyboard arrows + SPACE for shooting
